title: Table Top Warriors
description: Table Top Warriors is a website designed for trading card game enthusiasts to create, edit, and store their deck collection. Whether the users deck exists in real life, or virtually, Table Top Warriors is a useful tool in organizing the three most famous trading card games in the card game market.

title: Crypto Watcher
description: Crypto Watcher is a cryptocurrency trackin tool. Users can employ crytpowatcher to find a variety of information on a given cryptocurrency including: ranking, value, and percent change over time.

title: The Tech Blog
description: The Tech blog is a CMS style blog where users are able to publish posts and communicate with other users. This application uses the Model View Controller paradigm to implement functionality.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: This application allows the user to view the current weather and 5 day forecast for the cities entered. This application utilizes local storage to save the users previously searched cities.

title: JS Timed Quiz
description: This application is a timed JavaScript coding quiz. On completion, you will be able to view your score and see where you rank based on other users previous scores.

title: Work Day Scheduler
description: This application allows the user to save important tasks/items to storage so that they are able to keep treck of their busy schedule.
